message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. My initial offer for the product is $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and I would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.
I see your point, Bob. Let me think about it for a moment. My final offer for the product is $1025000.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1000000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Considering your interest in the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $1012500.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $990000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Bob. My final offer for the product is $1006250.
